info.title: Lookup
info.description: Test our API services using API Explorer. Looks ups from National Address

externalDocs.description: You can also view our written documentation.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: It is an optional input. Our API can provide response in Arabic or English with Arabic being the default language.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: It is an optional input. We currently support output for API in two formats Json and XML. You will be required to specify in which format you need response, default is Json.

parameters.name: cityid
parameters.description: Id of city for which you want to get list of districts. For example for City "Abha" ID is "15". You can obtain this id by using KSA Cities API

parameters.name: encode
parameters.description: Get response in utf-8.Pass input as 'utf8'.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: It is an optional input. We currently support output for API in two formats Json and XML. You will be required to specify in which format you need response, default is Json.

parameters.name: regionid
parameters.description: Default value is -1 which will return all cities in KSA.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: It is an optional input. Our API can provide response in Arabic or English with Arabic being the default language.

parameters.name: encode
parameters.description: Get response in utf-8.Pass input as 'utf8'.

parameters.name: servicecategoryid
parameters.description: ID of service category by which its recognized in system. You can obtain service category id by using Service Category API
